com.yahoo.memory

Class UnsafeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.memory.UnsafeUtil

  • public final class UnsafeUtil
extends Object
    Provides access to the sun.misc.Unsafe class and its key static fields.

    The internal static initializer also detects whether the methods unique to the Unsafe class in JDK8 are present; if not, methods that are compatible with JDK7 are substituted using an internal interface. In order for this to work, this library still needs to be compiled using jdk8 and it must be done with both source and target versions of jdk7 specified in pom.xml. The resultant jar will work on jdk7 and jdk8.

    Author:
    Lee Rhodes

    • Method Detail

      • assertBounds

        public static void assertBounds(long reqOff,
                                long reqLen,
                                long allocSize)
        Perform bounds checking using java assert (if enabled) checking the requested offset and length against the allocated size. If reqOff + reqLen > allocSize or any of the parameters are negative an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        reqOff - the requested offset
        reqLen - the requested length
        allocSize - the allocated size.

      • checkBounds

        public static void checkBounds(long reqOff,
                               long reqLen,
                               long allocSize)
        Check the requested offset and length against the allocated size. If reqOff + reqLen > allocSize or any of the parameters are negative an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        reqOff - the requested offset
        reqLen - the requested length
        allocSize - the allocated size.

      • checkOverlap

        public static boolean checkOverlap(long srcOff,
                                   long dstOff,
                                   long length)
        Return true if the given offsets and length do not overlap.
        Parameters:
        srcOff - the start of the source region
        dstOff - the start of the destination region
        length - the length of both regions
        Returns:
        true if the given offsets and length do not overlap.
